::Windlord::

"I'll send you my anergy-signature and you will able reconizme" said 
Windlord while he avoided the missiles and the bots "Open Voice 
command, download energy-signature to Cibertron fire!! Donwload 
weapon's energy to jets"

Suddenly Windlord's speed increased but still missiles was folling 
him. Windlord saw the mountains that separated the Cybertron fire to 
him and moved quickly towards them. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Chordate:
> 
> 
> 
> Chordate received the comm. transmission from Windlord and 
sighed.  "Hold on. 
>  We currently have a possible compromise with security.  I can't 
guarantee 
> your safety, but you are just barely out of sensor range, so I 
can't confirm 
> what you way, though I'm detecting Alliance members heading this 
way."
> 
> Chordate flipped a switch, the base going on red alert.  Klaxxons 
flashed 
> everywhere, sirens going off throughout the base.  He activated the 
internal 
> intercom.
> 
> "This is Chordate, red alert.  Prepare for possible Alliance 
attack.  There 
> is currently a hostile outside the base.  Requesting three people 
to go and 
> take him to the brig."
